title: Random Shooting Vigilante

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a random player other than yourself. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn who you targeted.
- You cannot die of guilt.
- Besides not being able to target yourself or dead players, your ability can target anyone in the game.

desc:
Post 3169
*Here to uphold the law- what, no, of course I wouldn't shoot the Mayor! Not on purpose, at least.*
